speaker.whotheyare: Mary Maker believes in the power of education to build peace and rebuild lives.
speaker.whylisten: A refugee from South Sudan's civil war, Mary Maker found solace and hope through education. She has lived in Kakuma refugee camp for several years, where she worked as a school teacher to a class of 120 students. She is now student again, attending a scholarship program in Rwanda, putting her on a path to university.
